description: The Zookeeper dashboard provides a detailed view of the Zookeeper service, including the overall status of the cluster and the statistics metrics, such as the latency, packets, ephemerals, approximate data size, alive connections, and so on.

panels.description: Number of zookeeper services in quorum
panels.title: Quorum

panels.description: Number of followers within the ensemble (should be quorum -1 ,ie 1 leader)
panels.title: Followers

panels.description: Number of followers which are in synched
panels.title: Synched Followers

panels.description: Number of pending syncs from the followers.
panels.title: Pending Syncs

panels.description: Number of zookeeper outstanding pod requests
panels.title: $pod

panels.description: Container CPU Usage should be < Limit (otherwise performance degradation)
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Container Memory Usage should be < Limit (otherwise swapping)
panels.title: JVM Memory Used

panels.description: Should not exceed 5% otherwise the performance of the application is degraded
panels.title: Time spent in GC

panels.description: Amount of time it takes for the server to respond to a client request (since the server was started). Should be < 10s
panels.title: Request Latency

panels.description: Number of queued requests in the server. This goes up when the server receives more requests than it can process. Should be < 10
panels.title: Outstanding Requests

title: Zookeeper
